inclusion.criterion: seizures documented by clinical and laboratory studies
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: male or female aged between 18 and 60 years
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: healthy control subjects will also be recruited
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: able to give written informed consent prior to participation in this study
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: patients younger than 18 or older than 60 years old
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: patients with a known treatable seizure etiology such as neoplastic or infectious disease
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: patients with MRI findings consistent with brain tumors, trauma or AVMs
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of epilepsy and CHF, but is otherwise likely eligible for the study.
